advance.name: Advance
advance.result: This mech can move up to its **Speed** in any direction.

assault.name: Assault
assault.result: _Overcharge 1_. This mech moves up to its **Speed** in any direction in a **straight line**. Then it can perform any one action with **range 2” or less** that costs **1 Action Point** for free (not spending the action point).

ram.name: Ram
ram.result: _This mech suffers 1 torso damage._ The target takes **a hit** and is pushed up to **4”** directly away from this mech.

slam.name: Slam
slam.result: _This mech suffers 1 torso damage._ The target takes **a hit**.

toss.name: Toss
toss.result: _Obstacle only._ Push the target **8” in any direction**.

blinded.name: Blinded
blinded.desc: This mech’s actions range is reduced to a **max of 5"**. Remove this condition at the end of its next activation.

burning.name: Burning
burning.desc:
When this mech activates, **flip a card** and resolve the effects corresponding with its suits:
♥: **Remove** the burning condition.
♦: Nothing happens.
♠: Suffer **1 damage on a random system**.
♣: Draw the top card of the deck and add it to your **overheat pile**. Discard and replace any jokers.

corrosion.name: Corrosion
corrosion.desc: This mech **can not add the armor value** of its systems to armor flips. Remove this condition at the end of the round.

jammed.name: Jammed
jammed.desc: The mech receives **-1 to all action flips**. Remove this condition at the end of its next activation.

knocked-down.name: Knocked Down
knocked-down.desc: This mech **must** spend its **next action point** standing up, then remove this condition.

immobilized.name: Immobilized
immobilized.desc: This mech total **Speed is 0**. This condition is removed at any time if this mech is pushed or placed.

marked.name: Marked
marked.desc: When targeting a model with marked with an action, the opponent may **remove the marked condition** from the target to gain a **+2 bonus to that action flip**.

shielded.name: Shielded
shielded.desc: When this mech receives a hit (or more), remove this condition to lower the **amount of hits taken to 0**.

minor-consequence.name: Minor Consequence
minor-consequence.desc:
If the overheat level is **equal or higher** than the value of the flip.
♥: Mech has **-2 Speed** and **-1 Reactor cards** until the end of the turn.
♦: Mech **gains** (or **removes**) the opponent’s choice of any **one condition**.
♠: Suffer **1 damage** on a random system.
♣: Draw the top **three** cards of the deck and add it to your **overheat pile**. Discard and replace any jokers.

major-consequence.name: Major Consequence
major-consequence.desc:
If the overheat level is **equal or higher** than **twice** the value of the flip.
♥: Activation immediately **ends**.
♦: Mech **gains** (or **removes**) the opponent’s choice of any **two conditions**.
♠: Torso suffers **1 damage**.
♣: Draw the top **six** cards of the deck and add it to your **overheat pile**. Discard and replace any jokers.
